name: @charged-particles/protocol-subgraph
description: Subgraph for the Charged Particles Protocol
author: Rob Secord <robsecord.eth>

scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 charged-particles/universe subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/ethereum-universe subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/goerli-universe-v2 subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/kovan-universe subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan-v2: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/kovan-universe-v2 subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan-dev: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/dev-universe subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan-secord: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ robsecord/kovan-universe subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan-elyx0: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ elyx0/kovan-universe-v2 subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan-acolytec3: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ charged-particles/kovan-acolytec3 subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network Mumbai charged-particles/mumbai-universe subgraph.mumbai.yaml
scripts.deploy:mumbai-v2: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network Mumbai charged-particles/mumbai-universe-v2 subgraph.mumbai.yaml
scripts.deploy:polygon: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --network Matic charged-particles/polygon-universe subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy:mantletest: graph deploy --node https://mantleapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://mantleapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs charged-particles/mantletest-universe subgraph.mantletest.yaml
scripts.deploy:mantlemainnet: graph deploy --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs charged-particles/mantlemainnet-universe subgraph.mantlemainnet.yaml
scripts.full:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && yarn gen:goerli && yarn deploy:goerli
scripts.full:mumbai: yarn prepare:mumbai && yarn gen:mumbai && yarn deploy:mumbai-v2
scripts.full:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet
scripts.full:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && yarn deploy:polygon
scripts.full:mantletest: yarn prepare:mantletest && yarn gen:mantletest && yarn deploy:mantletest
